name: Defeat Elite 4 Champion
Have all 18 types among your caught Pokes
Catch a Poke using all three fishing rods
Do Rock Tunnel without using Repel items
Evolve a Poke before defeating Brock
Toss a Lucky Egg
Have fused 10 Pokes
Have a Poke with exactly 50 Special Defense
Catch or faint Entei encounter
Defeat Sabrina before Erika and Koga
Defeat a Gym Leader with only Ice Type Pokes
Breed an egg and hatch it
Train a gift Poke to level 30 (no super splicer)
Use a stone to evolve a Poke
Do Victory Road without Repel items
Do Mt. Moon without using Repel items
Have 100 unfused Pokes
Fully evolve 10 different species of Pokes
Hit with a 70 or less damaging accuracy move
Defeat all trainers in Rocket Sewer (14)
Obtain 6 items with Flute in their name
Hit 5 times with a multi-hit move
Defeat a Gym Leader with only Flying Type Pokes
Fuse two different legendary pokes together
Catch 5 Pokes in Safari Zone
